summary: Zayora website - rebranding from tech products (bluetooth earbuds and smartwatches) to a clothing/apparel brand. Founded by Yash Jaiswal. Features product showcase, partner logos (YouTube, Bharat Ke Founder, MX Player, Blinkit, PhonePe), contact information, and coming soon section. Includes e-commerce functionality with product listing, cash on delivery checkout, and delivery charges. Company also owns a restaurant named 'ALL IS WELL .KANPUR'. Includes Holi festival promotion with free delivery offer and countdown timer.
architectural_notes: E-commerce functionality with product listing and pricing
Cash on delivery payment method only
Product review section for customer testimonials
WhatsApp contact integration for customer care
Orange and blue dual-color theme for website
YouTube video integration for promotional content
Restaurant business section for 'ALL IS WELL .KANPUR'
PhonePe logo integration in partner section
Clothing/apparel brand focus replacing tech product showcase
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Stylish casual cotton t-shirt in solid color on clean white background, front view, e-commerce style (clothing-tshirt.dim_800x800.png)
- Fashionable men's or unisex jacket in dark color on clean white background, front view, e-commerce style (clothing-jacket.dim_800x800.png)
- Trendy ethnic kurta in vibrant color on clean white background, front view, e-commerce style (clothing-kurta.dim_800x800.png)

existing_features.title: Create homepage layout with orange tech product theme featuring hero section, product showcase, partner logos section, and contact information footer
Add company information section displaying founder name 'Yash Jaiswal' and company name 'Zayora'
Create product showcase section featuring bluetooth earbuds and smartwatch with product images
Add partner logos section displaying YouTube logo, Bharat Ke Founder logo, and MX Player logo in full color
Add 'Coming Soon on Blinkit' section with Blinkit logo in color
Add contact information section displaying customer care number 9919031626 and email zayora11@gmail.com
Render all generated product images, partner logos, and brand assets as static files from frontend/public/assets/generated directory
Add a third product to the product showcase featuring the white/light blue wireless earbuds from the uploaded image with MRP â‚¹499
Implement cash on delivery checkout system with delivery charge of â‚¹50
Fetch and display product listings from backend on the product showcase section
Render the uploaded white/light blue wireless earbuds product image as a static asset from frontend/public/assets/generated directory
Embed the YouTube video (https://youtu.be/r9po-ShL-Nk?si=6Axf3Zax-qock6BQ) on the homepage, positioned appropriately within the existing layout
Create a ProductReviews component that displays customer reviews with reviewer name, review text, and rating (out of 5 stars)
Add at least 3-5 customer testimonials with text indicating high satisfaction, mentioning that over 1000 customers have purchased ('1k log karde hai' translates to '1k people have done it')
Integrate the ProductReviews component into App.tsx, positioning it between the ProductShowcase and PartnerLogos sections
Add a WhatsApp contact button or icon in the ContactFooter component that links to WhatsApp with customer care number 6392446165
Remove the VideoSection component from the App.tsx component layout
Delete the VideoSection.tsx component file from frontend/src/components

Update the application theme to use orange and blue color scheme throughout the UI, modifying the Tailwind CSS configuration and CSS custom properties in frontend/index.css and frontend/tailwind.config.js
Embed the YouTube video https://youtu.be/6sx2KLvPRXw?si=17Np1ELdXl8ncLdS on the homepage, positioned appropriately within the existing layout
Add a restaurant information section displaying the company-owned restaurant name 'ALL IS WELL .KANPUR' with appropriate styling
Add the original PhonePe logo to the partner logos section alongside existing logos (YouTube, Bharat Ke Founder, MX Player, Blinkit)
Create a scrolling announcement banner displaying 'Holi ðŸŒ€ festival offers is start delivery free now' with continuous horizontal scroll animation
Add a countdown timer to the offer banner showing hours, minutes, and seconds in a 24-hour unlimited loop format that continuously counts from 24:00:00 down to 00:00:00 and then resets
Render the generated PhonePe logo as a static asset from the frontend/public/assets/generated directory

Add a WhatsApp notification button to the OrderConfirmation component that opens WhatsApp with pre-filled message containing order details (customer name, address, phone number, product name, MRP, delivery charge) to phone number 9919031626

Update the HeroSection component to reflect a clothing/apparel brand identity: change the tagline, description, and visual language to reference fashion, style, and clothing instead of tech products (earbuds/smartwatches). Keep the brand name 'ZAYORA' and founder attribution 'Yash Jaiswal'.

Update the ProductCard and ProductShowcase components to reflect clothing product context: adjust feature labels (e.g., show 'Material', 'Sizes Available', 'Style' instead of tech specs), and ensure product display UI suits apparel presentation.

Update the AnnouncementBanner to replace the Holi festival tech offer text with clothing/fashion-themed promotional copy (e.g., referencing style, new collection, or fashion offers). Keep the scrolling animation and countdown timer intact.

Generate product images for at least 3 clothing items to use as static assets in frontend/public/assets/generated/: a stylish casual t-shirt, a fashionable jacket, and a trendy kurta/ethnic wear item. Images should have a clean white/light background suitable for e-commerce display.

Update the ProductReviews component testimonials to reflect clothing/apparel customer satisfaction rather than tech product reviews. Update review text to mention clothing quality, fit, style, and fast delivery.
